devdoc.author: rashtrakoff
devdoc.custom:experimental: This is an experimental contract/library. Use at your own risk.
devdoc.details: Contains functions for interacting with dHedge protocol pools

afterAgreement(dHedgeStorage.dHedgePool.details: Helper function that's called after agreements are created, updated or terminated

params._agreementClass: Address of the agreement calling this function
params._cbdata: Callback data we passed before agreement was created, updated or terminated
params._underlyingToken: Address of the underlying token on which operations need to be performed

beforeAgreement(dHedgeStorage.dHedgePool.details: Helper function that's called before agreements are created, updated or terminated

params._agreementClass: Address of the agreement calling this function
params._ctx: Context data of a user provided by SF contract
params._underlyingToken: Address of the underlying token on which operations need to be performed

returns._cbdata: Callback data that needs to be passed on to _afterAgreementCFA function

calcUserUninvested(dHedgeStorage.dHedgeP.details: Function to calculate uninvested amount of a user to return that after stream updation/termination

params._dHedgePool: Struct containing details regarding the pool and various tokens in it
params._depositToken: Address of the underlying token (deposit token and not the supertoken)
params._user: Address of the user whose uninvested amount has to be calculated

deposit(dHedgeStorage.dHedgePool storage.details: Function to deposit tokens into a dHedge pool

params._dHedgePool: Struct containing details regarding the pool and various tokens in it
params._depositToken: Address of the underlying token (deposit token and not the supertoken)

isDepositAsset(dHedgeStorage.dHedgePool.details: Wrapper function to check if an asset is accepted as deposit asset in a dHedge pool

params._dHedgePool: Struct containing details regarding the pool and various tokens in it
params._token: Address of the token to be deposited

returns._0: Boolean representing the status of the token for deposition

requireUpkeep(dHedgeStorage.dHedgePool s.details: Function which checks if deposit function can be called or not

params._dHedgePool: Struct containing details regarding the pool and various tokens in it

returns._depositToken: Address of the underlying token (deposit token and not the supertoken) This function is useful for on-chain keepers. Deposit function should only be called if `_reqUpkeep` is true let whatever be the address of the `_depositToken`

devdoc.title: dHedge helper library
